trans-unit.source: Represents an open connection to a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en åpen tilkobling til en [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When a new instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is created, the read/write properties are set to the following initial values unless they are specifically set using their associated keywords in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>er opprettet, lese-og skrivetilgang er angitt til følgende opprinnelige verdiene med mindre de er angitt med sine tilknyttede nøkkelord i den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>|empty string ("")| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>|15| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>|empty string ("")| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>|empty string ("")| You can change the value for these properties only by using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskaper | Standardverdi | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>| tom streng ("") | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>|&15; | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>| tom streng ("") | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>| tom streng ("") | Du kan endre verdien for disse egenskapene bare ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> class provides functionality for creating and managing the contents of connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>klassen gir funksjonaliteten for å opprette og administrere innholdet i tilkoblingsstrenger.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> class when given a string that contains the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> klasse når gitt en streng som inneholder tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: When a new instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is created, the read/write properties are set to the following initial values unless they are specifically set using their associated keywords in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>er opprettet, lese-og skrivetilgang er angitt til følgende opprinnelige verdiene med mindre de er angitt med sine tilknyttede nøkkelord i den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>|`connectionString`| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>|15| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>|empty string ("")| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>|empty string ("")| You can change the value for these properties only by using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskaper | Standardverdi | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>| `connectionString`| | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>|&15; | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>| tom streng ("") | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>| tom streng ("") | Du kan endre verdien for disse egenskapene bare ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> class provides functionality for creating and managing the contents of connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>klassen gir funksjonaliteten for å opprette og administrere innholdet i tilkoblingsstrenger.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: The connection used to open the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen som brukes til å åpne den [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] databasen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> class given a connection string, that does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref> and a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object that contains the user ID and password.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> klassen som er angitt en tilkoblingsstreng som ikke bruker <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref> og en <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> objekt som inneholder bruker-ID og passord.

trans-unit.source: A connection string that does not use any of the following connection string keywords: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_UserId" name="UserId" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Password" name="Password" href=""></xref>; or that does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContextConnection = true" name="ContextConnection = true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tilkoblingsstreng som ikke inneholder noen av følgende tilkoblingsstreng nøkkelord: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_UserId" name="UserId" href=""> </xref>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_Password" name="Password" href=""> </xref>; eller som ikke bruker <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContextConnection = true" name="ContextConnection = true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: If `credential` is null, SqlConnection is functionally equivalent to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `credential` er null, SqlConnection tilsvarer Funksjonsmessig <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the access token for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tokenet for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: The access token for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: Starter en transaksjon for databasen.

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: Denne kommandoen som er tilordnet til den [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementeringen av BEGIN TRANSACTION.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du må eksplisitt lagre eller rulle tilbake transaksjonen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>metode.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Forsikre deg om at den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] dataleverandøren for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaksjonen management modellen utfører på riktig måte, unngå å bruke andre transaksjonen management modeller, for eksempel én fra [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du ikke angir Isolasjonsnivået Isolasjonsnivået standard brukes.

trans-unit.source: To specify an isolation level with the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> method, use the overload that takes the `iso` parameter (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Til å angi et isolasjonsnivå med den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>metoden, Bruk overlasten tar i `iso` parameteren (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>).</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The isolation level set for a transaction persists after the transaction is completed and until the connection is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolasjonsnivået som er angitt for en transaksjon vedvarer etter at transaksjonen er fullført, og til tilkoblingen er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Setting the isolation level to **Snapshot** in a database where the snapshot isolation level is not enabled does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av Isolasjonsnivået tilgangsnivå for **Snapshot** i en database der Isolasjonsnivået statisk utvalg ikke er aktivert ikke iverksette et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The transaction will complete using the default isolation level.
trans-unit.target: Transaksjonen fullfører ved hjelp av Isolasjonsnivået standard.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If a transaction is started and a level 16 or higher error occurs on the server, the transaction will not be rolled back until the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Hvis en transaksjon er startet, og en nivå 16 eller høyere feil oppstår på serveren, transaksjonen ikke rulles tilbake til den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>metoden aktiveres.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown on **ExecuteReader**.
trans-unit.target: Ingen unntak for **ExecuteReader**.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is thrown because [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Når spørringen returnerer store mengder data og kall `BeginTransaction`, en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>et fordi [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] tillater ikke parallelle transaksjoner ved MARS.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: For å unngå problemet, alltid knytte en transaksjon kommandoen og/eller tilkoblingen før alle lesere er åpen.

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaksjoner, kan du se "eksplisitt" og "Koding effektiv transaksjoner" i [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer den nye transaksjonen.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: Parallelle transaksjoner tillates ikke ved bruk av flere aktive resultatsett (MARS).

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Parallelle transaksjoner støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level.
trans-unit.target: Starter en database transaksjon med Isolasjonsnivået angitt.

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: Denne kommandoen som er tilordnet til den [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementeringen av BEGIN TRANSACTION.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du må eksplisitt lagre eller rulle tilbake transaksjonen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>metode.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Forsikre deg om at den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] dataleverandøren for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaksjonen management modellen utfører på riktig måte, unngå å bruke andre transaksjonen management modeller, for eksempel én fra [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] default).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Etter en transaksjon er iverksatt eller rullet tilbake, Isolasjonsnivået for transaksjonen vedvarer for alle etterfølgende kommandoer som er i modus for autocommit (den [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] standard).

trans-unit.source: This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row.
trans-unit.target: Det kan føre til uventede resultater, for eksempel en Isolasjonsnivået for REPEATABLE READ vedvarende og låse andre brukere utenfor en rad.

trans-unit.source: To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=fullName> followed immediately by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestill Isolasjonsnivået til standard (READ COMMITTED), kan du utføre den [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)] angitt TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED setningen eller kall <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=fullName>etterfulgt av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> umiddelbart</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] isolation levels, see "Isolation Levels in the Database Engine" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] isolasjonsnivåene, kan du se "Isolasjon nivåer i databasemotoren" i [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaksjoner, kan du se "eksplisitt" og "Koding effektiv transaksjoner" i [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is thrown because [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Når spørringen returnerer store mengder data og kall `BeginTransaction`, en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>et fordi [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] tillater ikke parallelle transaksjoner ved MARS.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: For å unngå problemet, alltid knytte en transaksjon kommandoen og/eller tilkoblingen før alle lesere er åpen.

trans-unit.source: The isolation level under which the transaction should run.
trans-unit.target: Isolasjonsnivået som transaksjonen skal kjøres.

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer den nye transaksjonen.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: Parallelle transaksjoner tillates ikke ved bruk av flere aktive resultatsett (MARS).

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Parallelle transaksjoner støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction with the specified transaction name.
trans-unit.target: Starter en transaksjon for databasen med navnet på angitt transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: Denne kommandoen som er tilordnet til den [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementeringen av BEGIN TRANSACTION.

trans-unit.source: The length of the `transactionName` parameter must not exceed 32 characters; otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på den `transactionName` parameteren må ikke være lengre enn 32 tegn; hvis du vil utløst et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The value in the `transactionName` parameter can be used in later calls to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> and in the `savePoint` parameter of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i den `transactionName` parameter kan brukes i senere kall til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>og i den `savePoint` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du må eksplisitt lagre eller rulle tilbake transaksjonen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>metode.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaksjoner, kan du se "eksplisitt" og "Koding effektiv transaksjoner" i [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
