trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the schema to return.
trans-unit.target: Angir navnet på skjemaet til å returnere.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that contains schema information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som inneholder skjemainformasjon.

trans-unit.source: collectionName is specified as null.
trans-unit.target: collectionNameangis som null.

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer skjemainformasjon for datakilden for denne <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte strengen for skjemanavnet og den angitte strengmatrise for begrensning-verdier.

trans-unit.source: The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `restrictionValues` parameteren kan angi *n* av verdier, som er angitt av begrensningssamlingen for en bestemt samling.

trans-unit.source: In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to `null` and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for.
trans-unit.target: For å angi verdier for en gitt begrensning, og ikke angi verdier for andre begrensninger, må du angi foregående begrensningene `null` og sette inn verdien i for begrensningen som du vil angi en verdi for.

trans-unit.source: An example of this is the "Tables" collection.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på dette er "Tabeller"-samling.

trans-unit.source: If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions--database, owner, and table name--and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you need to pass in the following values: null, "Carl".
trans-unit.target: Hvis "Tabeller"-samlingen inneholder tre begrensninger--database, eier, og navnet på tabellen, og du vil komme bare tabellene som er knyttet til eieren "Carl", må du sende i følgende verdier: null, "Carl".

trans-unit.source: If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en begrensning-verdien ikke er sendt, brukes standardverdien for denne begrensningen.

trans-unit.source: This is the same mapping as passing in `null`, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den samme tilordningen som sende i `null`, som er forskjellig fra sende i en tom streng for parameterverdien.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet en tom streng ("") anses å være verdien for den angitte parameteren.

trans-unit.source: For a code sample demonstrating GetSchema, see <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.GetSchema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et kodeeksempel demonstrerer GetSchema, kan du se <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.GetSchema%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.GetSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the schema to return.
trans-unit.target: Angir navnet på skjemaet til å returnere.

trans-unit.source: A set of restriction values for the requested schema.
trans-unit.target: Et sett med verdier for begrensning for det forespurte skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that contains schema information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som inneholder skjemainformasjon.

trans-unit.source: collectionName is specified as null.
trans-unit.target: collectionNameangis som null.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] returns a warning or informational message.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] returnerer en advarsel eller informasjon melding.

trans-unit.source: Clients that want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventHandler> delegate to listen to this event.
trans-unit.target: Klienter vil behandle advarsler eller informasjonsmeldinger sendt av serveren må opprette en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventHandler>representant for å lytte til denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The InfoMessage event occurs when a message with a severity of 10 or less is returned by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: InfoMessage hendelsen oppstår når en melding med en alvorsgrad 10 eller mindre returneres av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Messages that have a severity between 11 and 20 raise an error and messages that have a severity over 20 causes the connection to close.
trans-unit.target: Meldinger som har en alvorsgrad mellom 11 og 20 øke det en feilen og meldinger som har en alvorsgrad over 20 årsaker tilkoblingen lukkes.

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] error levels, see "Database Engine Error Severities" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] feilnivåer, kan du se "Database Engine feil Severities" i [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.

trans-unit.source: For more information and an example, see [Connection Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon og et eksempel, kan du se [tilkobling hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Opens a database connection with the property settings specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString*>.
trans-unit.target: Åpner en databasetilkobling med egenskapsinnstillingene angitt av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString*>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>trekker en åpen tilkobling fra tilkoblingsutvalget Hvis det er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to an instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den oppretter en ny tilkobling til en forekomst av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> goes out of scope, it is not closed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>går ut av område, den ikke er lukket.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor eksplisitt lukke tilkoblingen ved å kalle <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you specify a port number other than 1433 when you are trying to connect to an instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] and using a protocol other than TCP/IP, the Open method fails.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir et portnummer enn 1433 når du prøver å koble til en forekomst av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] og ved hjelp av en annen protokoll enn TCP/IP-metoden Open mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: To specify a port number other than 1433, include "server=machinename,port number" in the connection string, and use the TCP/IP protocol.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi et portnummer enn 1433 inkluderer "server = maskinnavn, portnummeret" i tilkoblingsstrengen, og bruk av TCP/IP-protokoll.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] requires the Security permission with "Allows calls to unmanaged assemblies" enabled (<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> set to `UnmanagedCode`) to open a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> with SQL Debugging enabled.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] dataleverandøren for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] krever sikkerhetstillatelsen med "tillater at kall til uforvaltede samlinger" aktivert (<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> med <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>satt til `UnmanagedCode`) til å åpne en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>med SQL-feilsøking er aktivert.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>

trans-unit.source: Cannot open a connection without specifying a data source or server.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke åpne en tilkobling uten å angi en datakilde eller serveren.

trans-unit.source: or The connection is already open.
trans-unit.target: eller tilkoblingen er allerede åpen.

trans-unit.source: A connection-level error occurred while opening the connection.
trans-unit.target: En tilkobling det oppstod en feil oppstod under åpning av tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException.Number*> property contains the value 18487 or 18488, this indicates that the specified password has expired or must be reset. See the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword*> method for more information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <> </> *> egenskapen inneholder verdien 18487 eller 18488, betyr dette at det angitte passordet er utløpt eller må tilbakestilles. Se den <> </> *> metode for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.data.localdb>" name="<system.data.localdb>" href=""></xref> tag in the app.config file has invalid or unknown elements.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.data.localdb>" name="<system.data.localdb>" href=""> </xref> kode i filen app.config er ugyldig eller ukjent elementer.

trans-unit.source: There are two entries with the same name in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<localdbinstances>" name="<localdbinstances>" href=""></xref> section.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes to oppføringer med samme navn i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<localdbinstances>" name="<localdbinstances>" href=""> </xref> delen.

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Open*>, which opens a database connection with the property settings specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString*>.
trans-unit.target: En asynkron versjon av <> </> *>, som åpner en databasetilkobling med egenskapsinnstillingene angitt av den <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the connection timeout elapses.
trans-unit.target: Avbryte tokenet kan brukes til å be om at operasjonen forlates før tidsavbrudd for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions will be propagated via the returned Task.
trans-unit.target: Unntak overføres via returnerte oppgaven.

trans-unit.source: If the connection timeout time elapses without successfully connecting, the returned Task will be marked as faulted with an Exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilkoblingen tidsavbrudd tid det går uten har koblet deg, merkes returnerte oppgaven som mislyktes med et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The implementation returns a Task without blocking the calling thread for both pooled and non-pooled connections.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringen returnerer en aktivitet uten blokkerer kall tråden for både gruppert og ikke-gruppert tilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: After calling OpenAsync, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState> until the returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is completed.
trans-unit.target: Etter å OpenAsync, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A>må returnere <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState>før det returnerte <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>er fullført.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> </xref:System.Data.ConnectionState> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, if the connection was successful, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilkoblingen ble fullført, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A>må returnere <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState>.</xref:System.Data.ConnectionState> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the connection fails, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilkoblingen mislykkes, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A>må returnere <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState>.</xref:System.Data.ConnectionState> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: A call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding OpenAsync call.
trans-unit.target: Et kall til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>vil prøve å avbryte eller lukke det tilsvarende OpenAsync-kallet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)], see [Asynchronous Programming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om asynkrone programming i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] dataleverandøren for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)], se [asynkront Programming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The cancellation instruction.
trans-unit.target: Instruksjonene for annullering.

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Calling OpenAsync more than once for the same instance before task completion.
trans-unit.target: Kaller OpenAsync flere ganger for samme forekomsten før fullføring av oppgaven.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Context Connection=true" name="Context Connection=true" href=""></xref> is specified in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Context Connection=true" name="Context Connection=true" href=""></xref>er angitt i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: A connection was not available from the connection pool before the connection time out elapsed.
trans-unit.target: En tilkobling er ikke tilgjengelige fra tilkoblingsutvalget før tilkoblingen Tidsavbrudd utløpt.

trans-unit.source: Any error returned by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] that occurred while opening the connection.
trans-unit.target: Noen feil ble returnert av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] som oppstod under åpning av tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size (in bytes) of network packets used to communicate with an instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen (i byte) på nettverkspakkene som brukes til å kommunisere med en forekomst av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If an application performs bulk copy operations, or sends or receives lots of text or image data, a packet size larger than the default may improve efficiency because it causes fewer network read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program utfører massekopieringsoperasjoner, sender eller mottar mye text- eller image-data, pakkestørrelse som er større enn standard kan forbedre effektiviteten fordi den fører til færre nettverket lese og skrive operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: If an application sends and receives small amounts of information, you can set the packet size to 512 bytes (using the Packet Size value in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>), which is sufficient for most data transfer operations.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program sender og mottar litt informasjon, kan du angi pakkestørrelsen til 512 byte (av pakkestørrelse verdien i den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>), som er tilstrekkelig for de fleste dataoverføring operasjoner.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: For most applications, the default packet size is best.
trans-unit.target: Standard pakkestørrelse er best for de fleste programmer.

trans-unit.source: PacketSize may be a value in the range of 512 and 32767 bytes.
trans-unit.target: PacketSize kan være en verdi mellom 512 og 32767 byte.

trans-unit.source: An exception is generated if the value is outside this range.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er utenfor dette området, genereres det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Setting the default value to a number greater than 8000 will cause the packets to use the MultiPage allocator on the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] instead of the much more efficient SinglePage allocator, reducing the overall scalability of the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter standardverdien til et tall som er større enn 8000 vil føre til at pakkene til bruk med flere sider tildeler i forekomsten av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] i stedet for mye mer effektiv SinglePage-tildeler redusere den totale skalerbarheten til den [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information on how [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] uses memory, see [Memory Architecture](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143705) in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] bruker minnet, se [minnearkitektur](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143705) i [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.

trans-unit.source: The size (in bytes) of network packets.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen (i byte) på nettverkspakker.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8000.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 8000.

trans-unit.source: Registers the column encryption key store providers.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer kolonnen kryptering key store leverandører.

trans-unit.source: The custom providers
trans-unit.target: De egendefinerte tjenestene

trans-unit.source: If statistics gathering is enabled, all values are reset to zero.
trans-unit.target: Hvis innhenting av statistikk er aktivert, tilbakestilles alle verdier til null.

trans-unit.source: If statistics gathering is not enabled and this method is called, no error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis statistikk innsamling ikke er aktivert, og denne metoden, oppstår uten feil.

trans-unit.source: Returns a name value pair collection of statistics at the point in time the method is called.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en navnet verdi-par samling av statistikk på punktet i gang metoden kalles.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the values retrieved are those at the current point in time.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden kalles, er verdiene som er hentet de på gjeldende punkt i tide.

trans-unit.source: If you continue using the connection, the values are incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du fortsetter ved hjelp av tilkoblingen, er verdiene feil.

trans-unit.source: You need to re-execute the method to obtain the most current values.
trans-unit.target: Du må kjøre på nytt metode for å få de nyeste verdiene.

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference of type <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> items.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en referanse av typen <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>elementer.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the version of the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] to which the client is connected.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som inneholder versjonen av forekomsten av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] til klienten er tilkoblet.

trans-unit.source: The version is of the form *##.##.####*, where the first two digits are the major version, the next two digits are the minor version, and the last four digits are the release version.
trans-unit.target: Versjonen er i formatet *##. ##. ###*, der de første to sifrene er hoved, de neste to sifrene er den underordnede versjonen, og de fire siste sifrene er versjonen.

trans-unit.source: The string is of the form *major.minor.build*, where major and minor are exactly two digits and build is exactly four digits.
trans-unit.target: Er en streng i formatet *major.minor.build*, der overordnede og underordnede nøyaktig to sifre og kompilering er nøyaktig fire sifre.

trans-unit.source: ServerVersion was called while the returned Task was not completed and the connection was not opened after a call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OpenAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ServerVersion ble kalt mens returnerte oppgaven ikke ble fullført, og tilkoblingen ble ikke åpnet etter et kall til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OpenAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OpenAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The version of the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Versjonen av forekomsten av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: ServerVersion was called while the returned Task was not completed and the connection was not opened after a call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OpenAsync*>.
trans-unit.target: ServerVersion ble kalt mens returnerte oppgaven ikke ble fullført, og tilkoblingen ble ikke åpnet etter et kall til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OpenAsync*>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OpenAsync*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> during the most recent network operation performed on the connection.
trans-unit.target: Angir tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> under siste nettverket operasjonen utføres på tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState> enumeration indicating the state of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState>opplisting som angir statusen for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> </xref:System.Data.ConnectionState>

trans-unit.source: Closing and reopening the connection will refresh the value of State.
trans-unit.target: Lukke og åpne tilkoblingen vil oppdatere verdien for tilstand.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: When set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, enables statistics gathering for the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>og aktiverer statistikk innsamling for gjeldende tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Enabling statistics gathering has a minor, but measurable effect on performance and therefore should be enabled only when it is required.
trans-unit.target: Aktivering av statistikk innsamlingen har underordnede, men målbare innvirking på ytelsen, og derfor kan aktiveres når det kreves.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if statistics gathering is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis innhenting av statistikk er aktivert, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is the default.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>er standard.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt objekt som er en kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.ICloneable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ICloneable> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: This member is only supported by the .NET Compact Framework.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet støttes bare av .NET Compact Framework.

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt objekt som er en kopi av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that identifies the database client.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som identifiserer database-klienten.

trans-unit.source: The string typically contains the network name of the client.
trans-unit.target: Strengen inneholder vanligvis Nettverksnavnet på klienten.

trans-unit.source: The WorkstationId property corresponds to the `Workstation ID` connection string property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen WorkstationId samsvarer med den `Workstation ID` tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the database client.
trans-unit.target: En streng som identifiserer database-klienten.

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the name of the client computer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, navnet på klientdatamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: If neither is specified, the value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen er angitt, er verdien som er en tom streng.
